thread.section_title: Spotahome opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Spotahome | www.spotahome.com | 2 de 20
thread.title: Hatef SanaeiRad

author: Hatef SanaeiRad
title: Hatef SanaeiRad
text:
This was the first time I tried Spotahome. Overall it was a perfect experience. Thanks to my assistant agent, Matteo, I finalized my reservation in less than 2 days (that's a golden number for Milan!).
The room is as described and shown in the video, and all the requests made by landlord were previously mentioned in the website.
I am already recommending Spotahome to my friends and if needed I'd definitely try it again myself.
